column4: Hello, ... I am having problems changing the charset / locales on my 7.04 feisty, > $ sudo dpkg-reconfigure localeconf < does not work, neither does > $ sudo locale-gen es_VE en_US < ....is there another way to change the charset ?
hmm....Xorg.conf ....that's for X only, isn't it ?  I don't even have X installed.
Yes it is, I didn't realize that you weren't using X
